What country is ð§ð¼?

People often ask which country uses ð§ð¼ emoji flag. The answer is Botswana . Botswana is located in Southern Africa continent. The country area is 582000 km2, and the capital city is Gaborone ( -24.65451 , 25.90859 ). Some of the neighboring countries are Namibia, South Africa, Zambia, Zimbabwe , and the country is landlocked. Some of the timezones in Botswana are UTC+02:00 . The currency used in Botswana is Botswana pula ( BWP ). People in Botswana speak mostly English, Tswana . Botswana is part of the Southern Africa region.
